```{r setup}
library(lin.Reg)
```

This function can also be used for real world dataset. Use example dataset (gala in `library(faraway)`)

```{r}
## checking the sample dataset
if (!require("faraway")) install.packages("faraway")
library(faraway)
data(gala)
head(gala)
```
## building univariate model
```{r}
# Y: Species
# X: Endemics      

lmodel <- lin.Reg(gala$Species, gala$Endemics)

#display
summary.lin.Reg(lmodel)
```
## building multivariate model
```{r}
# Y: Species
# X: Endemics, Area, Nearest  

X <- cbind(gala$Endemics, gala$Area, gala$Nearest)

lmodel2 <- lin.Reg(gala$Species, X)

#display
summary.lin.Reg(lmodel2)
```
